name: TelephoneUseADLOrIADL
title: Telephone Use (ADL or IADL)
description: Assessment of the person's ability to use the telephone as an ADL/IADL (Business ID: Entry 37100)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of telephone use (ADL/IADL) ability.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's ability to use the telephone as an adl/iadl.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Telephone Use (ADL or IADL).),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Telephone Use (ADL or IADL).)

contains.display: Answering telephone call - most dependent performance during the past month [CMS Assessment]
Placing telephone call - most dependent performance during the past month [CMS Assessment]
Answering telephone call - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Placing telephone call - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]
